extendedInfo.description: Join the world's top relationship experts as they show you how to find true love, and how you and your soulmate can create a lasting, conscious loving relationship... FREE!Gay Hendricks, Ph.D. and Kathlyn Hendricks, Ph.D. are the authors of the bestselling books CONSCIOUS LOVING, LASTING LOVE, THE CONSCIOUS HEART, FIVE WISHES and THE CORPORATE MYSTIC, among many others.They have worked with over 30,000 individuals and more than 3,000 couples, and have appeared on OPRAH and CNBC, among hundreds of other television and radio shows.âKathlyn and Gay Hendricks are masters in the art of relationship transformation.â--John Gray, Ph.D., bestselling author of Men Are From Mars, Women Are From Venus----------"Gay and Kathlyn Hendricks show us how to discover the secrets to healing, love, intuition and insight.â Deepak Chopra, M.D., best-selling author of The Seven Spiritual Laws of Success and Quantum Healing----------"Gay and Kathlyn... offer invaluable insight into the real workings of making lasting, breakthrough commitments."â Bonnie Raitt, Grammy-winning recording artistThe Hendricks Relationship Advice app includes...***HOW TO GROW A CONSCIOUS RELATIONSHIP***THE SECRET TO EXPERIENCING MORE GENUINE LOVE***VIDEO LIBRARY - An avalanche of free relationship advice from Gay and Katie that will help you attract love, improve your relationships, manifest happiness and success, and more.***INSTANT INNER PEACE - a stunningly beautiful animated exercise that will calm your body's stress chemistry and help you relax in a matter of minutes.***And more...Grab your FREE app and start experiencing more love today!

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: I think this is one of the best apps ever great advice .. really opened my eyes to a lot of things.
reviews.author: A Google User
